Malgré la tristesse de son père et la réprobation de son frère, Marie Madeleine décide de suivre Jésus et ses apôtres à Jérusalem. Juste avant de partir, le prophète la baptise.

programme.title: Sympathie pour le diable
programme.desc: En novembre 1992, la ville de Sarajevo, assiégée depuis sept mois, est exsangue. Dans la cité, qui subit une pluie quotidienne d'obus, le journaliste Paul Marchand plonge régulièrement au coeur du conflit pour alimenter en information diverses radios francophones. Toujours accompagné par le fidèle Vincent, reporter photographe, le jeune homme prend tous les risques pour accomplir sa mission d'information. En compagnie de Boba, leur traductrice, les deux journalistes partent interviewer des responsables militaires serbes.

programme.title: L'opéra
programme.desc: Au moment où Jonas s'apprête à monter sur scène pour faire ses adieux, la compagnie reçoit la visite des membres du Bolchoï. Parmi les invités se trouve Sasha, l'ex-compagnon de Zoé.

programme.title: L'opéra
programme.desc: Plus que quelques jours avant le préavis de Zoé : elle va devoir quitter l'Opéra.Un départ qu'elle espère temporaire, en attendant la décision des Prud'hommes. Le temps d'une soirée festive, danseurs russes et français se défient amicalement. Zoé l'emporte haut la main, et finit dans les bras de Sasha. Flora, de son côté, cherche une coach pour aider à préparer le concours d'entrée, condition sine qua non à sa distribution sur "Les Liaisons dangereuses"..

programme.title: Ponette
programme.desc: Ponette, une petite fille de 4 ans, sort de l'hôpital avec un bras dans le plâtre. Elle vient d'échapper à l'accident dans lequel sa mère, qui conduisait la voiture, est morte. Son père la confie à sa tante Claire, qui l'élève avec ses propres enfants, Delphine et Matiaz. Mais Ponette n'accepte pas la terrible réalité. Elle s'isole peu à peu tout en cherchant à communiquer la nuit avec sa mère. Pour la rassurer, sa tante lui explique qu'elle peut, comme Jésus, ressusciter et revenir sur Terre. Malheureusement, la défunte ne réapparaît pas.

programme.title: Mud
programme.desc: Ellis et Neckbone, deux adolescents inséparables, échappent à la surveillance parentale pour une balade en bateau sur le Mississippi. Les deux garçons accostent sur une petite île et ne tardent pas à investir l'épave d'un bateau, logée en haut d'un arbre, qu'ils ont récemment découverte. Ils rencontrent bientôt Mud, un fugitif qui vit dans l'épave. Poursuivi par des chasseurs de primes, ce dernier leur demande de l'aide, en attendant de retrouver sa petite amie, Juniper. Le lendemain, Ellis et Neckbone aperçoivent la jeune femme en ville.

programme.title: Anomalisa
programme.desc: Michael Stone, auteur anglais, arrive en avion à Cincinnati pour donner une conférence sur son dernier ouvrage, «Comment puis-je vous aider à les aider». En vol, il se souvient de la lettre pleine de ressentiment que sa petite amie Bella lui avait envoyé, juste après leur rupture onze ans plus tôt. Arrivé à l'hôtel, alors que le souvenir de Bella le hante, il décide de l'appeler. Son ancienne compagne accepte de le retrouver mais leur dîner ne se passe pas vraiment comme Michael l'aurait cru.

programme.title: Ma mère, le crabe et moi
programme.desc: Depuis quelque temps, Tania, une adolescente, constate que sa mère, Cathy, est fuyante. Elle la soupçonne d'avoir un amant mais elle est loin de se douter de la réalité. Cathy est dans la tourmente depuis que les médecins lui ont diagnostiqué un cancer du sein. Elle appréhende la réaction de Tania, jeune fille insouciante et toujours entre deux conflits avec elle. Mais celle-ci va la surprendre et l'accompagner - tel un vrai petit soldat - dans cette lutte contre la maladie.

programme.title: Ma vie au grand air
programme.desc: Colombe et Jo, amies d’enfance, vivent dans une banlieue difficile et rien ne va plus dans leur quotidien. Colombe se remet difficilement de son veuvage, son fils Hector est déboussolé, et Jo s’est fait braquer dans son cabinet médical. Elles décident de changer d'air et trouvent, grâce à un mensonge, la maison de leurs rêves à la campagne. Gaby, la propriétaire, est lesbienne et pense que Colombe et Jo sont en couple.

programme.title: Histoire d'un regard
programme.desc: Mariana Otero se souvient du moment où elle a reçu un livre de photographies de Gilles Caron, reporter à la fin des années 1960. Elle se souvient de son émotion en redécouvrant ces images qu'elle connaissait mais dont elle ignorait l'auteur et surtout sa sidération, quand elle a découvert le parcours du photographe, mort à 30 ans au Cambodge, alors que le pays venait de tomber aux mains des khmers rouges. Cette disparition précoce lui a rappelé celle de sa mère, morte au même âge, à la même période. C'est aussi la proximité de ces deux destins qui l'a incitée à dresser un portrait en images de Gilles Caron.

programme.title: Heureux comme Lazzaro
programme.desc: En Italie, dans la campagne du Lazzio, il y a quelques décennies. Les habitants d'un hameau totalement isolé mènent une vie simple et modeste et travaillent pour le compte de la marquise Alfonsina de Luna, propriétaire d'une exploitation de tabac, ignorant totalement que celle-ci les exploite sans vergogne depuis des années. Parmi cette communauté de paysans, Lazzaro, un jeune homme un peu simple, risée de ses camarades, se lie d'amitié avec Tancrède, le fils rebelle de la comtesse, qui lui propose un étrange plan.

programme.title: Central do Brasil
programme.desc: En 1998, Dora, une institutrice à la retraite, complète sa pension en écrivant pour des illettrés à la Gare centrale de Rio («Central do Brasil»). Quand elle regagne sa banlieue, Dora et sa voisine Irène s'amusent à commenter les lettres. L'une d'elles est adressée au père du petit Josué, dont la mère Ana est morte. D'abord insensible, Dora accepte d'accompagner Josué sur les routes du Sertão (Nordeste) à la recherche de son père.

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason, un garçon rêveur de 6 ans, habite avec sa sœur, Samantha, et sa mère, Olivia, dans une petite ville du Texas. Olivia, divorcée, tente de concilier, tant bien que mal, sa vie de femme avec celle de mère de famille. Une année s'est écoulée et la petite famille loge désormais à Houston. Alors qu'ils sont gardés par leur grand-mère maternelle, leur père, qui s'est installé en Alaska, passe un matin les prendre pour passer du temps avec eux. A la fin de la journée, les deux enfants constatent que les relations entre leurs parents ne sont pas apaisées.

programme.title: L'opéra
programme.desc: Au moment où Jonas s'apprête à monter sur scène pour faire ses adieux, la compagnie reçoit la visite des membres du Bolchoï. Parmi les invités se trouve Sasha, l'ex-compagnon de Zoé.

programme.title: L'opéra
programme.desc: Plus que quelques jours avant le préavis de Zoé : elle va devoir quitter l'Opéra.Un départ qu'elle espère temporaire, en attendant la décision des Prud'hommes. Le temps d'une soirée festive, danseurs russes et français se défient amicalement. Zoé l'emporte haut la main, et finit dans les bras de Sasha. Flora, de son côté, cherche une coach pour aider à préparer le concours d'entrée, condition sine qua non à sa distribution sur "Les Liaisons dangereuses"..

programme.title: Wendy
programme.desc: Encore bébé, Wendy suit partout sa mère, Angela Darling, serveuse dans un restaurant du Sud des Etats-Unis. Alors que le jeune Thomas, venu fêter son anniversaire, s'entend dire qu'il finira homme de ménage, le garçon s'enfuit et rejoint dans un vieux train de fret un mystérieux enfant vêtu de haillons. Quelques années plus tard, la jeune Wendy joue avec ses frères aînés quand elle voit passé un train qui lui rappelle des souvenirs. Quelques heures plus tard, en pleine nuit, elle aperçoit un autre train, sur lequel court un en enfant dépenaillé.

programme.title: Si je t'oublie... Je t'aime
programme.desc: Une nouvelle maladie vient de frapper l'humanité, la ANI, affection neuro-inflammatoire, qui provoque des pertes de mémoires irréversibles. Pour certains, brutales, pour d'autres, beaucoup plus progressives. Emma, une vétérinaire mariée à Jude, un photographe, se remémore leur rencontre lors d'une soirée d'Halloween. Alors que la maladie se répand à une vitesse considérable, la jeune femme consigne ses souvenirs les plus précieux, tous liés à son histoire avec Jude. Elle constate par ailleurs que Jude semble présenter les premiers symptômes de la maladie.

programme.title: La vie c'est pas un jeu
Contre-enquête
programme.desc: Hélène Villon, journaliste d'investigation pour le journal « La République », reçoit un message sur son portable de Kevin Lannier. Ce militaire qu'elle avait interviewé à son retour d’Afghanistan dit vouloir lui parler rapidement. Mais quand elle arrive chez lui, il est trop tard. Le jeune homme a été retrouvé mort au pied de son immeuble. Il a chuté du toit. Alors que la police penche pour la thèse du suicide, Hélène, qui connaissait Kevin, décide de mener sa propre enquête. Lors des funérailles, elle aborde la petite amie de Kevin.

programme.title: Pizou l'ours blanc, la traversée de la banquise
programme.desc: Dans l'Arctique canadien, le jeune Luke découvre un ourson polaire abandonné et se met en tête de retrouver sa mère. Pour y parvenir, l'adolescent demande de l'aide à Muktuk, un aventurier à moitié inuit qui connaît parfaitement le territoire des ours polaires. Dans cette nature isolée et hostile, les dangers sont nombreux.

programme.title: La légende de Despereaux
programme.desc: Dans un royaume enchanté, la reine meurt, laissant le roi et leur fille, la princesse Petit Pois, inconsolables. Arrive une souris aux grandes oreilles : Despereaux Tilling. Ce dernier se lie avec la princesse, qui lui apprend à lire les livres plutôt qu'à les manger. Il découvre alors les contes de fées, pleins d'actions héroïques. Mais, à cause de cette amitié contre nature, Despereaux est banni par les siens et échoue dans le monde des rats. Dans cet univers cruel et malodorant, il rencontre un autre marginal : le rat Roscuro, gourmet sophistiqué et grand voyageur.

programme.title: Marie Stuart, reine d'Ecosse
programme.desc: Dans la seconde moitié du XVIe siècle, Marie Stuart, née catholique et encore enfant, est envoyée en France alors que les protestants se battent pour le contrôle de l'Ecosse. A 15 ans, elle épouse l'héritier du trône de France. A 18 ans, veuve, elle rentre dans une Ecosse dominée par les protestants et gouvernée par son demi-frère, le comte de Moray. Elisabeth est la reine protestante de l'Angleterre et Marie, qui peut légitimement prétendre au trône de par sa naissance, constitue une menace pour la reine.

programme.title: Alexandre
programme.desc: Au IVe siècle av. J.-C., Ptolémée raconte la vie d'Alexandre le Grand, qui fut un conquérant sans équivalant dans l'Antiquité. A 20 ans, après l'assassinat de son père, le roi Philippe II de Macédoine, Alexandre en devient le souverain. Porté par l'amour de sa mère, Olympie, l'enseignement d'Aristote et sa soif de conquêtes, Alexandre, à la tête d'une impressionnante armée, soumet la Grèce, fonde Alexandrie, défie les Perses, s'empare de Babylone et bâtit, à 32 ans, l'un des plus grands empires ayant jamais existé. Le grand conquérant règne désormais sur une importante partie du globe.

programme.title: Noé
programme.desc: Depuis son plus jeune âge, Noé descendant de Seth, perpétue la tradition de ses ancêtres et respecte la Terre et ses bienfaits, tandis que les descendants de Caïn exploitent la planète sans vergogne. Désormais adulte, Noé, père de famille, voit en rêve que la Terre va être inondée par des pluies torrentielles. Il part alors avec sa famille et prend sous son aile, Ila, une jeune fille blessée. Réfugié sur le mont Ararat et aidé par les gardiens, des géants de pierre, il entreprend la construction d'une arche qui abritera sa famille et les espèces animales.

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: Dans un petit village de Provence, au XIIe siècle, Balian, un jeune et humble forgeron, enterre son épouse adorée qui s'est suicidée. Un groupe de croisés débarque alors. Leur puissant chef, Godefroy d'Ibelin, un noble, lui révèle qu'il est son père et lui propose de l'accompagner à Jérusalem, en Terre sainte. Balian finit par accepter. En chemin, Godefroy est gravement blessé lors d'une embuscade. Le preux chevalier s'éteint peu de temps, non sans avoir adoubé Balian.

programme.title: Avé, César!
programme.desc: Producteur de cinéma, Eddie se charge également de régler les tracas des tournages ainsi que les bévues des stars. Il découvre ainsi qu'une de ses comédiennes vedettes est enceinte. Il songe donc à la marier. Un réalisateur ne veut pas du jeune premier envisagé. Et durant les prises de vues d'un péplum biblique, le célèbre Baird Whitlock, qui tient le rôle principal, disparaît. Il a été drogué et enlevé.

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Employé dans un grand cabinet juridique new-yorkais, Michael Clayton arrange discrètement les histoires embarrassantes de clients fortunés. Bientôt, il doit gérer le cas d'un collègue dont le comportement pose problème. Dans une affaire qui oppose une multinationale à des fermiers victimes de produits dangereux, Arthur Edens semble avoir pris le parti des plaignants au lieu de défendre les intérêts de la firme.

programme.title: Anna la psychologue
programme.desc: Un bon plan à trois avec leur psy et voilà nos deux tourtereaux réconciliés ! Un homme obsédé par une seule femme depuis toujours ? Les gros seins et la fougue d'Anna vont vite lui ouvrir de nouvelles perspectives ! Avec des méthodes pareilles, pas étonnant que son carnet de rendez-vous affiche complet... Heureusement, quand il s'agit de prendre en charge un dépendant sexuel qui ne peut attendre son tour, la secrétaire d'Anna est prête elle aussi à donner de sa personne en acceptant une sodomie profonde à même son bureau.

programme.title: JFK l'enquête
programme.desc: Après avoir consacré un long métrage de fiction à l'enquête menée sur l'assassinat de John Fitzgerald Kennedy, Oliver Stone se replonge 30 ans après dans le sujet pour y consacrer désormais un documentaire. A travers une série d'images d'archives, le réalisateur reconstitue d'abord la journée du 22 novembre 1963, à Dallas, avant de présenter les prémices de l'enquête qui allait être menée. La caméra d'Oliver Stone se retrouve ensuite à Dallas, 55 ans plus tard. Le cinéaste explique alors pourquoi il revient sur les lieux du crime, et se replonge dans le contexte de l'enquête.

programme.title: Le temps des égarés
programme.desc: Sira travaille comme traductrice pour l'Ofpra, l'organisme français qui gère les demandes d'asile. Sans scrupules, elle profite de sa position pour extorquer des fonds aux réfugiés qui passent par elle. En échange, elle leur propose un récit de vie qui convaincra à coup sûr les autorités. Un jour, elle trouve devant chez elle une petite Africaine dont le père a été arrêté. De son côté, Abdul a fui l'Irak et les combattants de Daesh. Il arrive en France dans un container avec d'autres clandestins et rejoint Jean-Paul, un ami photographe, qui accepte de l'accueillir le temps de ses démarches.

programme.title: Story Movies
programme.desc: Laetitia Casta et Louis Garrel / Alexandra Lamy et Philippe Katerine.

programme.title: Je sais tomber
programme.desc: Avec tout juste un sac plastique à la main, car ses affaires ont été volées, Kevin rentre chez ses parents en Picardie après un séjour à Barcelone. Sans argent, il se rend dans une agence d’intérim et commence à travailler dans une porcherie industrielle. Son père, avec qui il entretient des rapports compliqués, lui propose de l'employer dans son atelier de menuiserie mais Kevin préfère être indépendant. Percuté par une voiture, il rencontre Alice. La jeune femme qui travaille dans un cirque, l'attire. Kevin décide alors de s'initier à l'équitation acrobatique.

programme.title: Au secours ! J'ai rétréci ma prof
programme.desc: Felix vit seul avec son père, un homme distrait. Lors de son premier jour de classe dans une nouvelle école, le garçon fait la connaissance de mademoiselle Schmitt-Gössenwein, la très sévère directrice de l'établissement, qui est aussi son enseignante. Défié par ses camarades, il se rend de nuit dans l'école, mais est pris sur le fait par la directrice. Sans que Felix s'en rende compte, le fantôme des lieux lui vient en aide en rendant «Schmitty» toute petite. Cette dernière se cache dans le sac du garçon. Le lendemain matin, il la découvre sur sa table de chevet.

programme.title: Madagascar 2 : la grande évasion
programme.desc: Après avoir fui New York et échoué à Madagascar, Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Melman la girafe et Gloria l'hippopotame, parviennent à atteindre les plaines d'Afrique grâce à l'aide des pingouins, qui ont réparé l'épave d'un avion. Là, tous ont l'occasion de renouer avec leurs familles éloignées et leurs racines. Marty est comme un poisson dans l'eau, tandis qu'Alex, trop habitué au béton de la Grosse Pomme, ne retrouve pas ses instincts. Quant à la girafe, elle tente par tous les moyens d'avouer son amour à Gloria tandis que celle-ci est courtisée de toutes parts.

programme.title: Salaud, on t'aime
programme.desc: Jacques Kaminski, photographe de guerre, s'installe dans les Alpes pour profiter paisiblement de sa retraite. Alors qu'il vient de quitter sa femme, il s'éprend peu à peu de Nathalie Beranger, l'agent immobilier qui lui a trouvé sa maison. Parallèlement, il tente, en vain, de faire venir ses quatre filles, Printemps, Eté, Automne et Hiver. Son meilleur ami et médecin, Frédéric Selman, qui séjourne chez lui, ment aux quatre filles : il affirme que Jacques est atteint d'une grave maladie, espérant les faire venir.

programme.title: Alex Rider
programme.sub-title: S2 E4 Alex entre dans le jeu

programme.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
programme.desc: Blessé à mort par le puissant Darkseid, Superman pousse un cri qui traverse les villes, résonne jusqu'à l'île des amazones et au plus profond des océans. Quelque temps plus tard, alors que la Terre doit faire sans Superman, Bruce Wayne, conscient qu'une menace cosmique plane sur la planète bleue, décide de réunir une équipe de super-héros afin de la protéger. Il se rend d'abord en Islande, dans un village de pêcheurs, pour tenter de recruter Arthur Curry, alias Aquaman. Mais le puissant héros est réticent à l'idée d'intégrer une équipe.

programme.title: L'affaire Percy
programme.desc: En 1998, Percy Schmeiser cultivateur de colza depuis des décennies dans le Saskatchewan canadien, reçoit un courrier de la société Monsanto, lui demandant de verser la somme de 19 000 dollars pour l'utilisation de semences brevetées. Percy, qui a toujours refusé d'en utiliser, est convaincu que ces semences ont accidentellement été intégrées à ses cultures par un cultivateur voisin. L'agriculteur, qui refuse de se laisser impressionner par la puissante firme, fait appel à Jackson Weaver, d'un modeste cabinet d'avocats, pour le représenter en justice.

programme.title: Les Misérables
programme.desc: En 1815, Jean Valjean, vient de passer 19 ans en prison pour avoir volé une bouchée de pain et tenté plusieurs fois de s'évader. Une lettre du policier Javert indique que l'homme est libéré sur parole et qu'il reste dangereux. Ce papier infamant fait de Valjean un proscrit, que seul un prêtre accepte d'héberger. Ce même prêtre, dans un geste de générosité amène Valjean à changer. Huit ans plus tard, Valjean, maire et directeur d'usine à Montreuil, s'intéresse au sort de Fantine, contrainte à la prostitution pour aider sa fille Cosette.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S5 E9 Le salon des inventions

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S8 E6 Bleu comme la mort

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Ernest, un gros ours solitaire, bohème et bougon, a accueilli dans sa petite maison Célestine, une souricette orpheline, rebelle et intrépide. Ces deux personnages hors du commun, qui ont des caractères aussi différents que leur gabarit, apprennent à se connaître et à vivre ensemble. Ils côtoient Margotine, Mandarine et Mélusine, trois souris voisines, élèvent des abeilles et fabriquent leur propre confiture. Le plantigrade au grand cœur et le rongeur malicieux affrontent les problèmes de la vie quotidienne, comme la honte, la maladie ou les poux, partagent leurs joies et leurs peines, et s'interrogent sur leurs origines.

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S7 E1 La fille de l'air

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S7 E1 La fille de l'air

programme.title: Code of a Killer
programme.desc: En 1983, le corps sans vie de Lynda Mann est retrouvé dans un sentier, près de Leicester, en Angleterre. Menée par l'inspecteur David Baker, l'enquête n'aboutit pas. A l'Université, le scientifique Alec Jeffreys développe une méthode pour lire le code génétique d'un individu. Trois ans plus tard, une adolescente, Dawn Ashworth, est portée disparue. Elle a été vue pour la dernière fois non loin du lieu où le cadavre de Lynda Mann avait été retrouvé.

programme.title: Le code du tueur
programme.desc: David Baker a la conviction que le meurtrier de Dawn Ashworth est celui qui a tué Lynda Mann il y a trois ans. Gavin Hopkirk, un adolescent au comportement suspect, avoue le meurtre de Dawn Ashworth ; mais il nie celui de Lynda Mann. Prenant connaissance des travaux de Jeffreys, David Baker décide d'aller le rencontrer. Celui-ci parvient à isoler une séquence génétique de l'assassin qui innocente d'emblée Gavin Hopkirk.

programme.title: Code of a Killer
programme.desc: David Baker et son équipe doivent convaincre la population et toutes les instances policières, judiciaires et financières du bien-fondé du test génétique qui doit confondre le meurtrier. Aux côtés de Jeffreys, apportant son crédit scientifique, Baker organise un meeting où il expose aux habitants la nécessité d'effectuer le test. Une large adhésion est une condition du succès. Le 1er janvier 1987, l'opération commence.

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.sub-title: S1 E8 Le flux et le reflux

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: La défense de Madlen se complique lorsque les avocats apprennent que Will avait une maîtresse. Faith a du mal à jongler entre le procès, ses enfants, et le chantage de Gael Reardon. En outre, elle apprend qu'Evan pourrait bientôt être remis en liberté conditionnelle..

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Madlen est condamnée à quinze ans de prison. Faith, hors d'elle, souhaite plus que jamais découvrir la vérité sur le meurtre de Will, mais Gael la fait chanter et laisse un cadavre derrière elle. La fille de Steve est renversée par une voiture..

programme.title: Thronecast
programme.desc: In der von Sue Perkins und Jamie East präsentieren britischen Talkshow dreht sich alles um die Kultserie "Game of Thrones". Die Sendungen sind jeweils eine Stunde lang und enthalten Interviews mit Mitgliedern der Besetzung und der Crew. Zudem werden die bislang gelaufenen Episoden der Serie analysiert und es wird darüber spekuliert, was sich in der nächsten Folge ereignen könnte.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 6334354, Title: الفرقة الانتحارية 2, --- Description: الفرقة الانتحارية 2: Directed by James Gunn. With Michael Rooker, Viola Davis, John Ostrander, Joel Kinnaman. Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6334354/","name":"The Suicide Squad","alternateName":"الفرقة الانتحارية 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM3YzdlOWYtNjViZS00MTE2LWE1MWUtZmE2ZTcxZjcyMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODEyMTI1MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6334354/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Lancechristopher77","dateCreated":"2021-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed it","reviewBody":"I am in two minds about this film.

On one hand, I really did enjoyed it well enough.

However, I'm in no rush to see it again and it was rather... dull... in places.

Not something I thought I'd ever say about a James Gunn movie.

The beginning is great fun, and I don't know where else they can take the Harley chatacter after this (other than maybe a prequel?), and there are plenty of funny moments with some great action beats.

It just felt a little... I don't know.

Maybe because Gunn was clearly let off the leash he didn't have to restrain himself and so moments that may have been handled with more care were allowed to simply explode?

There is a lot of blood and gore, which is not necessarily a bad thing.

As I said, I enjoyed it, and I will watch it again someday, I'm just in no big rush to revisit it.

A generous seven out of ten.

I've read the Suicide Squad and DC comics for a very long time, and all the low reviews with the 'restore the Snyderverse' hashtag can go away.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":264773,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2021-08-05","keywords":"superhero,based on comic,dc comics,superheroine,suicide squad","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official "Rain" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1024573465","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEyNGE0NTAtMWIzNy00MmE5LWEzYTYtOGZmMTZkZDBiZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEyNGE0NTAtMWIzNy00MmE5LWEzYTYtOGZmMTZkZDBiZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Our only hope to save the world is a bunch of supervillains -- what could go wrong? programme.title: Raw Deal
Der City-Hai
programme.desc: Raw Deal: Directed by John Irvin. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Kathryn Harrold, Sam Wanamaker, Paul Shenar. A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0091828/","name":"Raw Deal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVkNWIwZmYtMzM5MS00ZTcwLWI0ZjEtNTVlMTNjZWViNzliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0091828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dworldeater"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is the audience that gets a raw deal from this troubled production","reviewBody":"In Arnold's best period of his film career, it is unquestionable that Raw Deal is his worst film from that era. Sandwiched between two of his best action movies, Commando and Predator. Raw Deal is real weak by comparison. The film is a mess and it seemed that those involved with the production could not agree on what they were making. Also, it would appear that funds were too low for anyone's vision to get on screen. The editing and music for this movie is really poorly done. This film is definitely lacking in a consistent tone or focus. The action scenes seem out of place as well. Raw Deal was probably meant to be a low budget police thriller. Any way you slice it, this film is not a cohesive piece of work and is filled with plot holes. Arnold, at this point in his career had massive physicality and charisma. However, he was lacking in acting skills and was horrendous in the more dramatic scenes here. The supporting cast was pretty good for the most part. Even though this is not Arnie's highest quality production, it still remains fairly entertaining. There is quite a bit of funny stuff here(some intentional and some not). Also, there is plenty of Arnold one liners with one of my favorites, "You should not drink and bake". While Raw Deal is not a well made movie, it is not totally unwatchable and is still quite amusing and outrageous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33406,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1986-06-06","keywords":"gang war,undercover,infiltration,shootout,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi572373529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNkNGFlZDctOWMxMS00Njg4LTgwY2EtYTU5MTM0ZDI0ZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNkNGFlZDctOWMxMS00Njg4LTgwY2EtYTU5MTM0ZDI0ZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002130/","name":"Kathryn Harrold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910737/","name":"Sam Wanamaker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410139/","name":"John Irvin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046277/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0490761/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898812/","name":"Luciano Vincenzoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006872/","name":"Sergio Donati"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0222904/","name":"Gary DeVore"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
Hellboy 2: Die goldene Armee
programme.desc:
Hellboy II: The Golden Army: Directed by Guillermo del Toro. With Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander. A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0411477/","name":"Hellboy II: The Golden Army","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NzgyMjc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU3MDI3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0411477/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vip_ebriega"},"dateCreated":"2009-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Take another trip to Del Toro's labyrinth.","reviewBody":"My Take: An elaborate set of imaginative creature effects and the always interesting lead character make the show worth watching.

I have a confession to make: I haven't seen the original HELLBOY yet. And neither have I seen it when I saw the much-praised sequel HELLBOY II: THE GOLDEN ARMY. But that's just what I really like about this sequel: It doesn't require you to have seen the original to fully enjoy this weird and entertaining excursion. Seeing the original would certainly add to the experience, but taken in its own rights, HELLBOY II does what a sequel should do: Not just live up to the expectations left by its predecessor, but also shine as a stand-alone effort.

And yet I have another confession: I have not seen Guillermo Del Toro's crown jewel PAN'S LABYRINTH yet. But seeing HELLBOY II, I am more than impressed by his wild imagination. HELLBOY may have been based on a comic book, but for anyone who isn't a fan of the comics, Hellboy is Del Toro's own creation. Like what Tim Burton did with BATMAN, Del Toro has modeled Hellboy (Ron Perlman) as his own creation on-screen, and he's a very interesting character. Perlman never wastes his opportunity to provide depth as well as nuance to his character. Perlman proves himself worthy, not just an ideal action hero (under tons of make-up), but as yet another actor who successfully embodies the role of a comic-book character.

As in PAN'S LABYRINTH, Del Toro populates the world of HELLBOY II with some truly fascinating and intriguing creatures. Roger Ebert made a truthful compliment by stating that the world of HELLBOY II reminded him of the famous Cantina scene from STAR WARS. What George Lucas has conceived within only a few minutes of screen time in his movie, Del Toro manages to do for 2 hours. The creatures are imaginative, not just in look but in personality, and they are at an abundance. Plus, they're also mostly done using make-up effects rather than CGI, which makes them all the more real. Add to Del Toro's imaginative set pieces, he is a master storyteller. From the opening scene, where "Broom" Bruttenholm (John Hurt) tells the legend of the "Golden Army" to a young Hellboy, Del Toro exhibits is true talents at telling a good story. There are moments of thrills and even laughs, and the visuals are superb. Supporting performances and some neat special effects (notice that I praised the CGI later in in this review) make for one worthy adventure ride. HELLBOY II isn't perfect, but it sure is great at what it was doing.

Rating: **** out of 5.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":264421,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2008-10-08","keywords":"superhero,twins,friendship,cat,elf","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. teaser trailer: Hellboy II: The Golden Army","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1588723993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMDU5MjI5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjM2ODc5._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMDU5MjI5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjM2ODc5._V1_.jpg","description":"This is a teaser trailer for Hellboy II: The Golden Army, directed by Guillermo del Toro"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427964/","name":"Doug Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020061/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239918/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586005/","name":"Mike Mignola"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0411477, Title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army, --- Description: Hellboy II: The Golden Army: Directed by Guillermo del Toro. With Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander. A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0411477/","name":"Hellboy II: The Golden Army","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NzgyMjc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU3MDI3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0411477/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"vip_ebriega","dateCreated":"2009-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Take another trip to Del Toro's labyrinth.","reviewBody":"My Take: An elaborate set of imaginative creature effects and the always interesting lead character make the show worth watching.

I have a confession to make: I haven't seen the original HELLBOY yet. And neither have I seen it when I saw the much-praised sequel HELLBOY II: THE GOLDEN ARMY. But that's just what I really like about this sequel: It doesn't require you to have seen the original to fully enjoy this weird and entertaining excursion. Seeing the original would certainly add to the experience, but taken in its own rights, HELLBOY II does what a sequel should do: Not just live up to the expectations left by its predecessor, but also shine as a stand-alone effort.

And yet I have another confession: I have not seen Guillermo Del Toro's crown jewel PAN'S LABYRINTH yet. But seeing HELLBOY II, I am more than impressed by his wild imagination. HELLBOY may have been based on a comic book, but for anyone who isn't a fan of the comics, Hellboy is Del Toro's own creation. Like what Tim Burton did with BATMAN, Del Toro has modeled Hellboy (Ron Perlman) as his own creation on-screen, and he's a very interesting character. Perlman never wastes his opportunity to provide depth as well as nuance to his character. Perlman proves himself worthy, not just an ideal action hero (under tons of make-up), but as yet another actor who successfully embodies the role of a comic-book character.

As in PAN'S LABYRINTH, Del Toro populates the world of HELLBOY II with some truly fascinating and intriguing creatures. Roger Ebert made a truthful compliment by stating that the world of HELLBOY II reminded him of the famous Cantina scene from STAR WARS. What George Lucas has conceived within only a few minutes of screen time in his movie, Del Toro manages to do for 2 hours. The creatures are imaginative, not just in look but in personality, and they are at an abundance. Plus, they're also mostly done using make-up effects rather than CGI, which makes them all the more real. Add to Del Toro's imaginative set pieces, he is a master storyteller. From the opening scene, where "Broom" Bruttenholm (John Hurt) tells the legend of the "Golden Army" to a young Hellboy, Del Toro exhibits is true talents at telling a good story. There are moments of thrills and even laughs, and the visuals are superb. Supporting performances and some neat special effects (notice that I praised the CGI later in in this review) make for one worthy adventure ride. HELLBOY II isn't perfect, but it sure is great at what it was doing.

Rating: **** out of 5.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":264421,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2008-10-08","keywords":"superhero,twins,friendship,cat,elf","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. teaser trailer: Hellboy II: The Golden Army","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1588723993","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMDU5MjI5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjM2ODc5._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMDU5MjI5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjM2ODc5._V1_.jpg","description":"This is a teaser trailer for Hellboy II: The Golden Army, directed by Guillermo del Toro","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427964/","name":"Doug Jones"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020061/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239918/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586005/","name":"Mike Mignola"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
They Want Me Dead
programme.desc:
Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO","dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

Sniper: Assassin's End
programme.desc:
Sniper: Assassin's End: Directed by Kaare Andrews. With Chad Michael Collins, Sayaka Akimoto, Tom Berenger, Ryan Robbins. Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12305696/","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNlNzBhNzMtNWNiOC00MGMxLWI3YjktNWMwNzJjMDEyZGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzY1ODU1OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12305696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"OzMovieWatcher"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The worst of Sniper series","reviewBody":"What can I say.... watched it to the end, did not hit fast forward at anytime, but it was no masterpiece. A B-grade movie

I found the dialogue and scene flow poor. Difficult to relate to the characters. Mostly just action. Found the story line very predictable... no surprises.

The tactical errors done by police were far too many for me to mention in goofs on this page. For example, swat teams entering a kill zone at almost shoulder to shoulder distancing. Only remotely resembled how real police conduct themselves in a combat zone. This is the worst of Sniper series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2017,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","keywords":"sniper,narrow escape,special ops,trade agreement,blood splatter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi87539225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1792864/","name":"Chad Michael Collins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2687122/","name":"Sayaka Akimoto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000297/","name":"Tom Berenger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1543846/","name":"Kaare Andrews"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137851/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3681509/","name":"Oliver Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065847/","name":"Michael Frost Beckner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508052/","name":"Crash Leyland"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

A B-grade movie

I found the dialogue and scene flow poor. Difficult to relate to the characters. Mostly just action. Found the story line very predictable... no surprises.

The tactical errors done by police were far too many for me to mention in goofs on this page. For example, swat teams entering a kill zone at almost shoulder to shoulder distancing. Iron Mask
programme.desc: Tayna pechati drakona: Directed by Oleg Stepchenko. With Jason Flemyng, Xingtong Yao, Jackie Chan, Arnold Schwarzenegger. Early 1700: Cartographer Jonathan Green (Jason Flemyng) from Viy (2014) is back to map the Russian Far East. He's forced on to China, where he confronts the Dragon Master et al. The iron masked Russian Czar escapes the Tower of London to a Russian ship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6218010/","name":"Tayna pechati drakona","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ViNDJjNzEtNmRmOS00MDA2LTljMTgtZTNiOTdhNmMzMzU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg4MDYyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Early 1700: Cartographer Jonathan Green (Jason Flemyng) from Viy (2014) is back to map the Russian Far East. The iron masked Russian Czar escapes the Tower of Londo","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6218010/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akira-hideyo"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tacky fun.","reviewBody":"What can you expect from a Jackie Chan movie? Too much, too little, too late, yes? Throw in Arnold Schwarzenegger, a few European retro stars and lots of Russian vodka lime twist with Eastern and western mythical creatures thrown into the mix and viola, 2 hours of silly whack. The acting of all the actresses are blatantly cliche and nubile so prepare to dumb down. I gave a 6 for costumes, good enough special effects, scenery and enthusiastic over acting by all the extras. It's not everyday so many get to make some coin and see Jackie and Arnold buddy up.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5864,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2019-08-16","keywords":"sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Iron Mask","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1559544089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU3ZWU3NzUtNjQxNy00ZTVmLWE4MjctNGQ2MDM3NTk0MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU3ZWU3NzUtNjQxNy00ZTVmLWE4MjctNGQ2MDM3NTk0MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002076/","name":"Jason Flemyng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4080670/","name":"Xingtong Yao"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897071/","name":"Oleg Stepchenko"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0341688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137977/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8552961/","name":"Dmitry Paltsev"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1923871/","name":"Alexey A. programme.title: Solomon Kane
Solomon Kane
programme.desc:
Solomon Kane: Directed by M.J. Bassett. With James Purefoy, Mark O'Neal, Robert Orr, Richard Ryan. A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0970452/","name":"Solomon Kane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDMwOTkxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg5OTM1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0970452/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"StevinTasker"},"dateCreated":"2010-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid, old fashioned, sword and sorcery flick","reviewBody":"If you took the time to find it, then you wont be disappointed with this solid, old fashioned sword and sorcery movie.

The tales of Solomon Kane have been around longer than most, the character first appearing in mass market print back in the late twenties, but they've not been filmed. Many others, borrowing from it have been filmed so you will be quite familiar with the twists and turns having seen them elsewhere. The saving grace here is that it's all done quite well. James Purefoy is every part the tortured warrior and it's good to see Max Von Sydow and the legend that is Pete Poslethwaite up on the big screen. It's a creepy, dark movie at times and the extra effort they've put into the set design and cinematography really helps to set the scene. The story nips along to a satisfying conclusion. The fight choreography is very well done and FX are good as well.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72274,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-12-23","keywords":"violence,redemption,revenge,burning sword,handheld weapon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi731555097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzMzNzQ2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNDMxOA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzMzNzQ2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNDMxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mercenary who owes his soul to the devil redeems himself by fighting evil. 
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700856/","name":"James Purefoy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001884/","name":"Max von Sydow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1248393/","name":"Rachel Hurd-Wood"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1068186/","name":"M.J. programme.title: Missing in Action
Missing in Action
programme.desc:
Missing in Action: Directed by Joseph Zito. With Chuck Norris, M. Emmet Walsh, David Tress, Lenore Kasdorf. Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087727/","name":"Missing in Action","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRkY2M1YWMtYmZiMy00NDMzLTg0OTctYWNmNzllMGNlYmMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087727/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nazi_Fighter_David"},"dateCreated":"2004-06-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ghosts of Vietnam hell haunting Norris...","reviewBody":"There has been great controversy about U.S. prisoners of war (POWs) and those missing in action (MIAs) during the Vietnam War 

While Colonel Braddock - one of the outspoken proponents of the theory that Americans are still being held in Vietnam today - is now in Saigon at the president's request to see if there are more MIAs in Vietnam 

The American delegation hopes Braddock's presence would increase their ability to negotiate But General Trau (James Hong) believes that Colonel Braddock is not a prisoner of war, but a common criminal, brought to Saigon only in an attempt to embarrass his government 

The sexy aide of Senator Porter, Lenore Kasdorf, thinks that Braddock is the most undiplomatic man she has ever met 

The action begins when the Vietnam vet - not supposed to leave the hotel without an escort - assaults General Trau's residence, pays for a bullet-proof speed riverboat and blazes his way with an old war buddy called Tuck (M. Emmet Walsh) through the jungles of Saigon 

Norris, challenging several unpredicted attacks from his enemies, takes at last his revenge after he experiences the fear, chaos and atrocities of the Vietnam hell","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14765,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1984-11-16","keywords":"vietnam war,rescue mission,one man army,prisoner of war,martial arts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Missing in Action","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1626845721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMxYjM0YjQtZDMyNi00NGNiLThjYmQtYWFhMWUwN2MyYTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMxYjM0YjQtZDMyNi00NGNiLThjYmQtYWFhMWUwN2MyYTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Missing in Action"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001826/","name":"M. Emmet Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0872261/","name":"David Tress"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957263/","name":"Joseph Zito"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206391/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798649/","name":"Arthur Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506062/","name":"Larry Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082893/","name":"Steve Bing"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

While Colonel Braddock - one of the outspoken proponents of the theory that Americans are still being held in Vietnam today - is now in Saigon at the president's request to see if there are more MIAs in Vietnam 

The American delegation hopes Braddock's presence would increase their ability to negotiate But General Trau (James Hong) believes that Colonel Braddock is not a prisoner of war, but a common criminal, brought to Saigon only in an attempt to embarrass his government 

The sexy aide of Senator Porter, Lenore Kasdorf, thinks that Braddock is the most undiplomatic man she has ever met 

The action begins when the Vietnam vet - not supposed to leave the hotel without an escort - assaults General Trau's residence, pays for a bullet-proof speed riverboat and blazes his way with an old war buddy called Tuck (M. Emmet Walsh) through the jungles of Saigon 

Norris, challenging several unpredicted attacks from his enemies, takes at last his revenge after he experiences the fear, chaos and atrocities of the Vietnam hell","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14765,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1984-11-16","keywords":"vietnam war,rescue mission,one man army,prisoner of war,martial arts","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Missing in Action","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1626845721","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMxYjM0YjQtZDMyNi00NGNiLThjYmQtYWFhMWUwN2MyYTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMxYjM0YjQtZDMyNi00NGNiLThjYmQtYWFhMWUwN2MyYTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Missing in Action","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001826/","name":"M. Emmet Walsh","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0872261/","name":"David Tress"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957263/","name":"Joseph Zito"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044937/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206391/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798649/","name":"Arthur Silver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506062/","name":"Larry Levinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082893/","name":"Steve Bing"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning
Missing in Action 2 – Die Rückkehr
programme.desc:
Missing in Action 2: The Beginning: Directed by Lance Hool. With Chuck Norris, Soon-Tek Oh, Steven Williams, Bennett Ohta. Prequel to the first Missing In Action, set in the early 1980s it shows the capture of Colonel Braddock during the Vietnam war in the 1970s, and his captivity with other American POWs in a brutal prison camp, and his plans to escape." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089604/","name":"Missing in Action 2: The Beginning","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzODkyODg4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTQ2NjE2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Prequel to the first Missing In Action, set in the early 1980s it shows the capture of Colonel Braddock during the Vietnam war in the 1970s, and his captivity with other American POWs in a brutal prison camp, and his plans to escape.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089604/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hey_Sweden"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Action movie gold.","reviewBody":"It's not surprising to learn that Chuck Norris made this series as a tribute to his brother who had been killed in Vietnam. He really gave all that he had to these films. It may be manipulative but damn is it ever satisfying. The villains are the kind of loathsome scum whom you JUST CAN'T WAIT to see messed up in a variety of ways. And the good guys are fleshed out enough as characters that you do feel bad for them, and want to see them get their revenge.

As one can guess, this is a prequel to the original "Missing in Action" film of 1984. It shows how Chucks' colonel character, James Braddock, was shot down and captured during the war, and the tortures that he and his men are obliged to endure for the next several years, even after the war has basically ended. The sadistic colonel in charge of his work camp, Colonel Yin (Soon-Tek Oh) acts like a dictator, and just when you think you can't hate this guy any more, he ups the stakes yet again.

With Lance Hool taking the directors' reins, this proves to be a high old time for the action junkie, underscored by the genuine poignancy to be found in stories about prisoners of war. This is exciting much of the time, with kick ass battle footage, lots of explosions, lots of gunfire, and some breathtaking scenery. Chuck is a formidable hero as always, and Oh is a deliciously evil bad guy. Lending strong support are Cosie Costa, Joe Michael Terry, and especially John Wesley as the ailing Franklin. Steven Williams is good in an initially unlikable part as a captain eager to cooperate with his captors in exchange for better treatment. It's also cool to see hulking screen heavy Professor Toru Tanaka and "Ninja III: The Domination" villain David Chung as two of the guards.

All in all, this is solid entertainment, complete with a high body count and never ever boring.

Eight out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8235,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1985-03-01","keywords":"hairy chest,prequel,vietnam war veteran,soldier,missing in action","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644902/","name":"Soon-Tek Oh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931736/","name":"Steven Williams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393678/","name":"Lance Hool"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206391/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082893/","name":"Steve Bing"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506062/","name":"Larry Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798649/","name":"Arthur Silver"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III
Braddock: Missing in Action 3
programme.desc: Braddock: Missing in Action III: Directed by Aaron Norris. With Chuck Norris, Aki Aleong, Roland Harrah III, Miki Kim. Braddock mounts a one-man assault to free his wife and son who are still being held in a Vietnam prison camp." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094792/","name":"Braddock: Missing in Action III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTRjODU0MTUtMjBmMi00ZTBmLTk2MDYtOWQzYjg1M2FiZDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjY3MjUzNDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Braddock mounts a one-man assault to free his wife and son who are still being held in a Vietnam prison camp.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094792/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"soranno"},"dateCreated":"2002-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"A little rehashed but not entirely bad","reviewBody":"In the wake of "Rambo 3" and a bunch of police action thrillers with Vietnam War veterans or references and homages to the war as well as the recent hits of Oliver Stone and Stanley Kubrick, "Braddock: Missing In Action 3" doesn't have a shot in accomplishing anything original since similar material has already been done way too many times before during the second half of the 1980's. However, Chuck Norris' starring role as the Vietnam War veteran who goes on another deadly mission to rescue more POW's prevents this film from being a complete downer but doesn't prevent it from becoming too routine."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6336,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","War"],"datePublished":"1988-01-22","keywords":"kung fu,cult film,vietnam war veteran,aerial camera shot,child in jeopardy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3352937241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjAwMTkzZjAtZTc3MC00OGRmLWIwMGItZjY3MTllOWYwYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjAwMTkzZjAtZTc3MC00OGRmLWIwMGItZjY3MTllOWYwYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Braddock mounts a one-man assault to free his wife and son who are still being held in a Vietnam prison camp."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018080/","name":"Aki Aleong"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364036/","name":"Roland Harrah III"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0635760/","name":"Aaron Norris"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206391/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798649/","name":"Arthur Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506062/","name":"Larry Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082893/","name":"Steve Bing"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
They Want Me Dead
programme.desc:
Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3215824, Title: Those Who Wish Me Dead, --- Description: Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO","dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

Iron Mask
